text: Hagi kini ne'mo'a hankave ke huzmantege'za ana avontafera maka kumatega ame hu'za eri'za vu'za eza hu'naze. Hagi vihuma hugagi'naza rankumapima Susama nemani'naza vahera ama ana nanekea eriama hazage'za maka vahe'mo'za antahi'naze. Hagi anama huteke kini ne'ene kea waini tina nenekema mani'nakeno'a Susa kumapi vahera antahintahi zamimo'a savri hige'za tusi koro nehu'za antahitahi hakare hu'naze.
